00024 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00025 /// IGNATView
00026 ///
00027 /// @description  The IGNATView class is a interface for the combination Graph
00028 ///               and Trace view. It is based off of the QSplitter.
00029 ///
00030 /// @limitations  This is a pure virtual class and no objects of this class
00031 ///               may directly be created.
00032 ///
00033 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00034 class IGNATView : public QSplitter
00035 {
00036     Q_OBJECT
00037 
00038 public:
00039     IGNATView( QWidget *parent = 0 );
00040     virtual ~IGNATView();
00041 
00042     virtual QToolBar *getToolBar();
00043     virtual void loadFromFile( const QString &fileName ) = 0;
00044     virtual void saveImage( const QString &fileName ) = 0;
00045     virtual void saveToFile( const QString &fileName ) = 0;
00046  virtual void signalRepaint(void) = 0;
00047 
00048 protected:
00049     virtual void setupToolBar() = 0;
00050     QToolBar *m_toolBar;
00051 };
00052 
00053 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054 /// CGNATViewFactory
00055 ///
00056 /// @description  The CGNATViewFactory class is a factory that returns a
00057 ///               IGNATView loaded with the filename passed.
00058 ///
00059 /// @limitations  None
00060 ///
00061 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00062 class CGNATViewFactory
00063 {
00064 public:
00065     static IGNATView *createGNATView( const QString &fileName,
00066                                       QWidget *parent = 0 );
00067     static IGNATView *createGNATView( PROGRAM_MODE type,
00068                                       const QString &fileName,
00069                                       QWidget *parent = 0 );
00070 };

00072 #endif /*_CGNATVIEWFACTORY_H_*/
